content: The US Core ped vitals e.g. bmi for age are derived from the FHIR vitals profiles .... They were created using the spreadsheet and for several elements the must support cells were blank which apparently led to must-support = false. However the vitals profile defined these elements as must-support = true. The issue is that the validator did not catch this (nor did I until looking at the SD directly). Where should I log a tracker re the validator . Jira or a Github issue?
sounds like both, actually - a tracker to fix the tooling issue and a jira issue to fix up the us core issue
jira issue is done and applied. so a github issue on validator?
no that'd be the publisher, I think
